innhold.avsnitt: If you or the other parent become sick and cannot take care of the child, you can choose between:

liste.punkt: The other parent taking over the parental benefit period of the person who is sick.
The person who is sick postponing his/her parental benefit period.

innhold.avsnitt: You can delay or transfer the parental benefit due to sickness at any time after the child is born. The parent who is sick is entitled to the sickness benefit instead if the illness is such that he/she is completely dependent on assistance in taking care of the child.

avsnitt.lenke: Read more about the sickness benefit
